### Prerequisites

- Dynamo platform installed
- At least one backend worker running

### Usage

```bash
python -m dynamo.frontend --router-mode kv --http-port 8000
```

### Kubernetes

```yaml
apiVersion: nvidia.com/v1alpha1
kind: DynamoGraphDeployment
metadata:
  name: router-example
spec:
  graphs:
    - name: frontend
      replicas: 1
```
